name: Curious Cat (mhcreative)
description:
Curious Cat is a 2D platformer designed with slow and fast paced play in mind. Please read devlogs. 

Brat the cat needs to escape her home before it floods. Thankfully a wizard endows Brat with abilities that increase her jump and wit to escape the treacherous home which. As a side effect of the wizards spell, the home's occupants have been mutated into dangerous entities. Will you sneak past them without conflict or will you destroy them. 

Escape the house before it's too late.

Credits: 

Moe Hammoud - Developer
Stephen Max - Developer
Aaron MacFadyen - Sound FX and Music
